price: Allah will say, “You only stayed for a while, if only you had known[50].
arabic: قَٰلَ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ لَّوۡ أَنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: [50] That the life of this world was transitory and was a test, but you did not realize it.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla in labith'tum illā qalīlan law annakum kuntum taʿlamūna
